benchmark_details.name: StructTest
benchmark_details.overview: StructTest is a novel benchmark that evaluates LLMs on their ability to follow compositional instructions and generate structured outputs, providing an unbiased, cost-effective, and difficult-to-cheat evaluation framework.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of StructTest is to assess LLMs' ability to follow complex instructions for generating structured outputs that are decoupled from underlying data and programmatically verifiable.

data.source: Test cases are generated programmatically for structured output tasks.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are computed based on structural accuracy and correctness of parsed content.
methodology.interpretation: Performance is evaluated based on the correctness of structured outputs.
methodology.validation: Tasks are designed to be highly unlikely to have been encountered by existing models during training.
